==Useful Info==
'''Louise the Corrupted''' is a heavily-armed [[unique]] spellcaster notorious for sending characters to [[the Abyss]] far earlier than they'd like. She's usually armed with a decent weapon, [[tower shield]], and armour, making her less fragile than the average unique caster.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:14-15
*The [[Elven Halls]]
*[[The Swamp]]
*[[The Snake Pit]]
*[[The Shoals]]
*The [[Spider's Nest]]

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Getting hit by Banishment without the proper gear is an almost certain death sentence for low-level characters. If you spot Louise and are within easy reach of some [[stairs]], consider making a tactical retreat back to your [[stash]] for whatever [[willpower]]-bolstering gear you have available.
*She can only banish you as long as you're in her line of effect, so summons can be very useful for blocking it.
*Louise cannot [[see invisible]]. Use this to greatly reduce the chance of her using magic against you.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.19]], Louise had the [[Sting]] spell.

[[Category:Human]]
